HOME.TITLE: Share essential information about your pet
HOME.DESCRIPTION: With an identifier like PET-ID, you can link general (non-sensitive) information and vaccination history of your pet, as well as other information that can be used in case your pet goes missing.

SEARCH.LABEL_INSTRUCTIONS: Search for your pet's information by its identifier
SEARCH.MESSAGE_PET_ID_MUST_BE: They must be 30 to 50 characters, and only letters and numbers are allowed.
